Hi

I am working on junit for last couple of months. I want a changed 
excluded.properties file to be used with junit. I tried to do it but i 
could'nt make it work. Can someone please help me in this regard. just 
consider me a newbee and explain where to put it, what should be th 
folder structure, how to include it in classpath. I am calling the 
class through ant with java. I want to skip few pakages to be reloaded 
each time. 

Regards

Sid
